com.example.stanza

Class PoemRecyclerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<PoemRecyclerAdapter.PoemViewHolder>
      • com.example.stanza.PoemRecyclerAdapter

  • public class PoemRecyclerAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<PoemRecyclerAdapter.PoemViewHolder>
    An Adapter to provide binding from a data set of poems to card views that are displayed within a RecyclerView.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PoemRecyclerAdapter.OnItemClickListener
      An interface for providing click functionality for each poem in a RecyclerView
      class  PoemRecyclerAdapter.PoemViewHolder
      A class to describe an item view and metadata about its place within the RecyclerView.

        parent - The ViewGroup into which the new View will be added after it is bound to an adapter position.
        viewType - The view type of the new View.

      • swapCursor

        public Cursor swapCursor(Cursor cursor)
        Changes the data set being displayed in the RecyclerView.
        Parameters:
        cursor - The Cursor providing read-write access to the new data set to be displayed.
        Returns:
        The previous data set that was being displayed.

      • onBindViewHolder

        public void onBindViewHolder(PoemRecyclerAdapter.PoemViewHolder poemViewHolder,
                             int position)
        Called by RecyclerView to display the data at the specified position. This method updates the contents of each poem card at the given position.
        Specified by:
        onBindViewHolder in class android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<PoemRecyclerAdapter.PoemViewHolder>
        Parameters:
        poemViewHolder - The poem card to be updated.
        position - The position of the card within the poem data set.
